divs: Sighting DetailsBackyard fire, star gazing, always checking out the sky, bright star like, until we looked thru binoculars and saw lights on the object, brights quickly flashing lights, satelite maybe, not sure, hovered for hours and moved upwards, could be the movement of the earth that made the change more upward. Silver exterior with bright lights middle of object, to high to be helicopter, heard several loud booms prior to seeing object, 9pm time. At first sighting was bright until flickering got me curious, felt sorta scared, five persons viewed same.did not lose sight went to bed, still there, same place but higher in sky
Summary: ?satelite, possible? Bright like star, with circular lights in middle of disc
